title: Peter Ruckman Collection Preview [CSA]
description:
Welcome to the Peter Ruckman Collection Preview. Sit back and relax as you enjoy a sample video called "Five Surprises In Hell". Also included are cover images of additional titles available in the 400 gigabyte mega-torrent "ChristianStuff". 

Our digital library offers hundreds of files in three categories: Christian, Health and Fiction.

The speed at which files can be retrieved depends on patrons making returns to the library by sharing the files they receive. In other words, the success of this archive depends on you!

To access the library you'll need to get the torrent file from TorCache or you can use the magnet link (THE LINKS ARE IN THE README).
_____________________________________________________________________________________

MORE INFO:

Dr. Ruckman was an independent Baptist preacher who stood for the absolute authority of the Authorized KJV Version of the Holy Bible.

As an artist Dr. Ruckman proclaimed the Gospel of Jesus Christ through the medium of chalk talk drawings in a television program called "Drawing Men To Christ".
_____________________________________________________________________________________

TITLES:

Basic Manuscript Evidence 

Five Surprises in Hell

Four Judgements

Great and Precious Promises

Hated Without a Cause

Mark Of The Beast

Safe Forever

The Gospel According To Daniel

The Great White Throne Judgment

The Holy Spirit

The Most Important Step

Where the Dead Go

*** MORE ***
_____________________________________________________________________________________

The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge:
but fools despise wisdom and instruction. 
Proverbs 1:7

ChristianStuff: Health mind, body and soul!
